song_name: In The Still Of The Nite (From "The Jacksons")
lyrics:
do do do do
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby waa
in the still of the night
i held you
held you tight
oh i love
love you so
promise i'll never
let you go
in the still of the night
in the still of the night
i remember that night in may
when the stars were right up above
i hope and i pray
to keep your precious love
so before the night
hold me again
with all of your might
in the still the night
in the still of the night
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby doo (repeat)
so before
the night
hold me again
with all of your might
in the still of the night
oooo in the still of the night
in the still of the night
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby doo
shoo doop shooby doo  (repeat)
